datastructures

Class Stack<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • datastructures.Stack<E>

  • public class Stack<E>
extends java.lang.Object
    Lightweight standard stack datastructure implementation with array. Array size is doubled during the push operation if needed. Thus, push is amortized O(1) while worst case is O(n).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Stack()
      Initialize stack with default size.
      Stack(int size)
      Initialize stack with given size.

      Pop element from stack.

      Push element to stack.
